verses.plain: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.

tokens.t: Hear my prayer, O
, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me,
in thy righteousness.

verses.plain: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

tokens.t: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

verses.plain: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.

tokens.t: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.

verses.plain: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.

tokens.t: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.

verses.plain: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.

tokens.t: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.

verses.plain: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.

tokens.t: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul
after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.

verses.plain: Hear me speedily, O LORD: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.

tokens.t: Hear me speedily, O
: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.

verses.plain: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.

tokens.t: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.

verses.plain: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.

tokens.t: Deliver me, O
, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.

verses.plain: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.

tokens.t: Teach me to do thy will; for thou
my God: thy spirit
good; lead me into the land of uprightness.

verses.plain: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy name’s sake: for thy righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.

tokens.t: Quicken me, O
, for thy name’s sake: for thy righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.

verses.plain: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.

tokens.t: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I
thy servant.

footnotes.text: lest…: or, for I am become like, etc
flee…: Heb. hide me with thee
